exec: testBodyType = (pm, type) => pm.test(`Response Body is an ${type.toUpperCase()}`, pm.expect(pm.response.json()).to.be.an(type));
testBodyField = (pm, field, value) => pm.test(`${field.toUpperCase()} is correct`, pm.expect(pm.response.json()[field]).to.equal(value));
testBodyFieldById = (pm, id, field, value) => pm.test(`${field.toUpperCase()} is correct`, pm.expect(pm.response.json().filter(obj => obj.id == id)[0][field]).to.equal(value));
testBodyObjectExistsById = (pm, id) => pm.test("Object not found", pm.expect(pm.response.json().filter(obj => obj.id == id).length).to.not.equal(0));
testBodyObjectNotExistsById = (pm, id) => pm.test("Object not found", pm.expect(pm.response.json().filter(obj => obj.id == id).length).to.equal(0));
